2. PCBM (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) (PEDOT))

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

The only valid material name in the paragraph is "PCBM" (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) (PEDOT)). The term "LUMO" refers to a concept in chemistry (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital) and does not refer to a specific material name.

Paragraph: This might be attributed to the smaller LUMO offset or less ideal mixing morphology between the polymer and PCBM.

| --- |

The morphology of the polymer and PCBM refers to their structure and composition, which is not a material property. Therefore, "morphology" is not a valid entity in this context. Only "LUMO offset" is a valid entity that refers to a material property.
